name: Me Animal
description:
Me Animal is a tiny puzzle game. Fall asleep at one of the dream altars to become one of the animals. Each animal has its own abilities to help you progress further. The objective is to gather all animals at the magic stones circle.

Keyboard controls

- Arrow keys or WASD to walk
- Space or E to activate
- Q to wake up

Controller controls

- Left stick to walk
- A or X to activate
- B to wake up
